channel.title: CVE Feed for ArmorX Global Technology Corporation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ArmorX Global Technology Corporation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-48384|2023-12-15T08:30:29.753Z -- armorx%20global%20technology%20corporation -- armorx%20spam
item.description: ArmorX Global Technology Corporation ArmorX Spam has insufficient validation for user input within a special function. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to inject arbitrary SQL commands to access, modify and delete database.
